pages.text: This is a $(l:programming/conditions)Condition/$ widget.$(p)The $(thing)Condition: RF/$ widget allows you to (remotely) check if the $(thing)Forge Energy (FE)/$ level of the block(s) in the connected $(l:programming/area)Area/$ widget matches the configured FE threshold.$(p)$(italic)Despite its name, this widget checks FE, not RF (Redstone Flux). The name is historical./$
